name: Do It With Hay
description:
In this game you will be a worker on a small farm.
You’re going to unload haystacks from truck to barn in time, since the driver won't wait long!
The main thing - watch to your staminа and don’t overwork.
Although, no one will prevent you from distracting yourself a little and diluting your workdays with something funny.

In this game you can do the following:

  • Become the best among other players
  • Drink
  • Throw a pitchfork
  • Listen to perky country
  • Drink a lot
  • Swim in a small lake
  • Interact with extraterrestrial civilizations

Don't get too drunk!
